name: Incognito Air Swagger
description: My name is DirkSwagger, i play torn. I got bored one day flying to china. So I decided to change out the plane to my faction name and end of my name. I even updated the airplane look. I will be making more up dates to this script as the ideas come to me mind.
additional_info:
This script only works when flying.  
######################################################
*Bug i got to fix the switch between the going and returning flights. #
######################################################
*Increased Timer Size 
*I also stroked a outline and dropped a shadow on the time remaining.

-future updates...
 Multi planes not just the single plane
